title: A Medical Multimodal Large Language Model for Pediatric Pneumonia
details: W Tian, X Huang, T Cheng, W He, J Fang, R Feng… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Pediatric pneumonia is the leading cause of death among children under five years worldwide, imposing a substantial burden on affected families. Currently, there are three significant hurdles in diagnosing and treating pediatric pneumonia. Firstly …
